title: ExecutionDigest
description: A digest of the execution state of a node.

stateDigest.description: A digest of the state of a node.

semanticDigest.description: A digest of the "semantic intent" of the resource with respect to the dependency graph

dependenciesDigest.description: A digest of the semantic digests the dependencies of a resource.

dependenciesStale.description: A count of the number of execution dependencies that are stale

dependenciesFailed.description: A count of the number of execution dependencies that failed
